definitions.definition: to (cause to) turn around and around, especially fast:
examples: The earth spins on its axis.

definitions.definition: If your head or the room spins, you feel as if it is turning around and around, and you cannot balance:
examples: The room started spinning and I felt faint.

definitions.definition: the movement of something turning round very quickly:
examples: I hit something on the road, which sent the car into a spin.
